title: LLM Foundations: How Large Language Models Work
excerpt: Part 1 of the LLM series covers tokenization, strengths, limits, and what to know before comparing GPT, Claude, Llama, or Gemini.
author: Autonomous Agentic

title: GPT-5.1 Deep Dive: Pick the Right Variant
excerpt: Part 2 compares GPT-5.1 Instant vs Thinking, highlighting latency, reasoning depth, pricing, and when to deploy each.
author: Autonomous Agentic

title: Claude 4 Guide: Safety-First AI
excerpt: Part 3 explains Claude 4's safety-first approach, strengths, weaknesses, and best-fit workloads across industries.
author: Autonomous Agentic

title: LLM Builder's Guide: Llama vs Gemini
excerpt: Part 4 compares Llama 3 and Gemini 3, then shares a routing playbook for mixing models based on intent, latency, and cost.
author: Autonomous Agentic

title: Creating your first AI Agent in Copilot Studio
excerpt: This is a simple, non-production agent built to demonstrate the initial steps of creating a copilot in Copilot Studio. It answers basic general questions and is used for testing and training only.
author: Autonomous Agentic

title: Personalise Your AI: Changing the Start Message in Copilot Studio
excerpt: Learn how to change your Copilot Studio agent's start message to unlock greater customisation. First impressions matter, so why should it be any different for your agent?
author: Autonomous Agentic
